title: How to create simple descriptions to referring certain champions for dummies:

replies.body: Wow that is probably one of the most clever memes I've seen on the boards so far.

this is actually the best one.

{{champion:161}} Ah, I see you████████████████

{{champion:29}} Ah, ██████r█ a █████t███████
{{champion:31}} Ah, I see you█e a ██████t███████
{{champion:45}} ███ s███████ ma██████████ll.
{{champion:201}} Ah, I see you're a man ██ ███████ ██ ████
This would also apply to Xin.
Illaoi too

PARTY CRASH

What does the guy actually say?
"Ah, I see you are a man of culture as well." I believe.
Thanks! d(^-^)b
I just had to upvote after *reading* Sona one.

{{champion:44}} Ah, I see you're a man██████as well.
FTFY

{{champion:201}}*

FTFY
You're a genius
I don't get the Lux one :/
She yells "AAAAAH" while ulting. I'm not sure if her new VO still includes that one.

Think she still does in her new VO.
But tbh I often forget her base lines cuz I play Ele. Lux more often.
I thought she screamed Demacia…?
I read it as laughter.
https://cdn.meme.am/instances/74135760.jpg
I was able to read and underatand all of that. Wp.
wow, you can read???

> [{quoted}](name=Pakki,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=YEAo7RPN,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-04-17T13:15:00.905+0000)
>
> wow, you can read???

Sometimes. Sometimes i look at words and how they sound plays in my head. But that gets kinda annoying sometimes.

strange, only when you read things?

I normally hear voices all the time.

> [{quoted}](name=Mallecke,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=YEAo7RPN,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2017-04-18T03:29:19.298+0000)
>
> strange, only when you read things?
> 
> I normally hear voices all the time.

Wait..... Thats READING?!? i have a perfectly logical excuse as to why i hear voices then. Thank you potential figment of my imagination!
I'm a lesser being. I can only read things not from Sona.
This... Is so fucking genius...
{{champion:64}} Ah, I-
